planet.name: Kepler-410 b
Kepler-410 A b
HD 175289 b
KIC 8866102 b
KOI-0042 b
KOI-0042 01
planet.description: Kepler-410 b is a Neptune sized exoplanet aroud the bright star Kepler-410. The host star is in fact one of the brightest hosts of all currently known transiting exoplanets. The confirmation was difficult because there is a second, fainter star nearby. Transit timing variations inficate the presence of another planet in the system.
